description.value: This suite comes equipped with an amount of simple and martial blasters and vibroweapons, as well as light, medium, and heavy armor and shields, to outfit a force equal to twice the ship's suite capacity by size, as shown in the @JournalEntry[Mnvw9iBw8gxgfCXw]{Starship Size Suite Capacity} table. Additionally, it comes with a number of firing ranges to accommodate a number of troopers equal to one-fourth the ship's suite capacity by size, as shown in the @JournalEntry[Mnvw9iBw8gxgfCXw]{Starship Size Suite Capacity} table.
